Verses: 1 ippadippatta Oozhiyaththai Udaiyavargalaagiya Naangal Irakkam Petriruppadhaal Sorndhupogiradhillai.

2 vetkamaana Andharanga Kaariyangalai Naangal Veruththu, Thandhiramaai Nadavaamalum, Dheva Vasanaththaip Purattaamalum, Saththiyaththai Velippaduththugiradhinaale Dhevanukku Munbaaga Ellaa Manusharudaiya Manasaatchikkum Engalai Uththamarendru Vilangappannugirom.
3 engal Suvisesham Maraiporulaayirundhaal, Kettuppogiravargalukke Adhu Maraiporulaayirukkum.

4 dhevanudaiya Saayalaayirukkira Kiristhuvin Magimaiyaana Suviseshaththin Oli Avisuvaasigalaagiya Avargalukkup Piragaasamaayiraadhapadikku, Ippirapanjaththin Dhevanaanavan Avargaludaiya Manadhaik Kurudaakkinaan.
5 naangal Engalaiye Pirasangiyaamal, Yesuvaik Karththarendrum, Engalaiyo Yesuvinimiththam Ungal Oozhiyakkaararendrum Pirasangikkirom.
6 irulilirundhu Velichchaththaip Piragaasikkasonna Dhevan Yesuvin Mugaththilulla Thamadhu Magimaiyin Arivaagiya Oliyaith Thondrappannumporuttaaga, Engal Irudhayangalile Piragaasiththaar.
7 indha Magaththuvamulla Vallamai Engalaal Undaayiraamal,devanaal Undaayirukkiradhendru Vilangumpadi, Indhap Pokkishaththai Manpaandangalil Petrirukkirom.
8 naangal Eppakkaththilum Nerukkappattum Odungippogiradhillai; Kalakkamadaindhum Manamurivadaigiradhillai;
9 thunbappaduththappattum Kaividappadugiradhillai; Keezhe Thallappattum Madindhu Pogiradhillai.
10 karththaraagiya Yesuvinudaiya Jeevanum Engal Sareeraththile Vilangumpadikku, Yesuvin Maranaththai Eppozhudhum Engal Sareeraththil Sumandhu Thirigirom.
11 eppadiyenil, Saavukkinamaana Engal Maamsaththile Yesuvinudaiya Jeevanum Vilangumpadikku Uyirodirukkira Naangal Eppozhudhum Yesuvinimiththam Maranaththirku Oppukkodukkappadugirom.
12 ippadi Maranamaanadhu Engalidaththilum, Jeevanaanadhu Ungalidaththilum Belanseygiradhu.
13 visuvaasiththen, Aagaiyaal Pesinen Endru Ezhudhiyirukkirapadi, Naangalum Andha Visuvaasaththin Aaviyai Udaiyavargalaayirundhu, Visuvaasikkirapadiyaal Pesugirom.
14 karththaraagiya Yesuvai Ezhuppinavar Engalaiyum Yesuvaikkondu Ezhuppi Ungaludanekoodath Thamakkumunpaaga Niruththuvaarendru Arindhirukkirom.
15 devanudaiya Magimai Vilanguvadharkedhuvaagak Kirubaiyaanadhu Anegarudaiya Sthoththiraththinaale Perugumpadikku Ivaiyellaam Ungalnimiththam Undaayirukkiradhu.
16 aanapadiyinaale Naangal Sorndhupogiradhillai; Engal Purambaana Manushanaanadhu Azhindhum, Ullaana Manushanaanadhu Naalukkunaal Pudhidhaakkappadugiradhu.

17 melum Kaanappadugiravaigalaiyalla, Kaanappadaadhavaigalai Nokkiyirukkira Namakku Adhiseekkiraththil Neengum Lesaana Nammudaiya Ubaththiravam Migavum Adhigamaana Niththiya Kanamagimaiyai Undaakkugiradhu.
